review: How did I ever live without my Chromecast?  This thing is the greatest!  I can stream basically any video from my phone right to my TV.  It was incredibly easy and fast to set up.  I was slightly disappointed at first because streaming from my laptop seems to be a little choppy, but now I'm very happy with it after trying it with my phone.  There is no lag or choppiness when casting from my phone, and using the Chromecast is the quickest way to watch streaming media vs xbox or roku.
author: Matthew Berendsen
